ComicInfo.Summary:
Dorothy and friends free Glinda and Adraste, but something-- make that a lot of somethings-- would see them all dead. Is it too late for the world of Oz anyway? Back in the Emerald City, the Heart of Oz is finally unearthed-- and nobody was expecting what they found. And the truth about the Wizard is revealed, as his power grows even more dangerous!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Geebo Vigonte & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Anthony Spay & David Ocampo | 3 | D | Cover D | Martin Coccolo & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | VIP ComicFest Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Dawn McTeigue (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing | F | VIP ComicFest Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Dawn McTeigue (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing |
